name: Emerald Enclave Scout

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
text: The scout has advantage on saving throws against poison.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
text: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The scout makes two melee attacks.

action.name: War Pick
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

description: Source: Out of the Abyss p. 130
